title: Blockchain Network Configuration
description: Schema defining a blockchain network configuration for RPC connection and metadata.

name.description: Human-readable name of the blockchain network, e.g. 'RSK'.

logoURI.description: Public URL to a chain logo image.

chainId.description: Unique numeric identifier for the blockchain network.

rpcUrls.description: List of RPC endpoint URLs used to connect to the blockchain.

nativeCurrency.description: Information about the native currency of the blockchain network.

symbol.description: Ticker symbol of the native currency, e.g. 'ETH'.

decimals.description: Number of decimal places used by the native currency.

address.description: 20-byte hex address with 0x prefix (EVM). Provide if native coins has both zero address and ERC-20 address.

blockExplorerUrls.description: List of URLs pointing to blockchain explorers.
